statements: SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking;
SELECT crop_id, growth_stage FROM crop_growth_tracking;
SELECT growth_stage, sensor_data FROM crop_growth_tracking;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering';
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking WHERE crop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_id, growth_stage FROM crop_growth_tracking WHERE growth_stage LIKE 'Ger%';
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(jsonb_array_elements_text(sensor_data -> 'temperatures')::numeric) AS avg_temperature FROM crop_growth_tracking;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_id, MAX(temperature) as max_temp, MIN(humidity) as min_humidity FROM sensor_data GROUP BY crop_id;
SELECT sensor_id, crop_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE crop_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT crop_id, stage, description FROM crop_growth WHERE start_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN crop_growth ON sensor_data.crop_id = crop_growth.crop_id WHERE sensor_data.temperature > 25 AND crop_growth.stage = 'Mature'
SELECT * FROM crop_growths;
SELECT growth_stage, timestamp FROM crop_growths WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_sensors WHERE crop_id = 2 AND sensor_id = 1;

SELECT crop_growths.crop_id, sensor_data.sensor_type, sensor_data.sensor_location FROM crop_growths JOIN crop_sensors ON crop_growths.crop_id = crop_sensors.crop_id JOIN sensor_data ON crop_sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_growths;
SELECT crop_id, sensor_data FROM crop_growths WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE installation_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT crop_id, sensor_id FROM crop_sensors WHERE crop_id = 10 AND sensor_id = 3;
SELECT growth_stage, timestamp FROM crop_growths WHERE growth_stage LIKE '%flowering%'
SELECT * FROM crop_info;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crop_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature, humidity, light_intensity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM growth_stage_history WHERE crop_id = 5 AND growth_stage = 'mature' ORDER BY end_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_info WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crop_info WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 50;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_id, growth_stage, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM growth_stage_history WHERE crop_id = 5 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, crop_id, recorded_timestamp FROM sensor_data;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM growth_stage;
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop WHERE crop_name LIKE '%Tomato%' AND extract(month from planting_date) = 5;
SELECT sensor_type, location, installation_date FROM sensor WHERE installation_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT stage_name, description FROM growth_stage WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;

SELECT sd.recorded_timestamp, sd.temperature, sd.humidity, sp.progress_percentage FROM sensor_data sd JOIN stage_progress sp ON sd.data_id = sp.sensor_data_id WHERE sd.temperature > 30 AND sp.progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY sd.recorded_timestamp DESC;
